title: The Rebuilding State of the NBA | Group Chat
description:
The Lakers lose a shocker to the Nets, only their second defeat in 13 games (1:04). We then discuss what rebuilding looks like for the league and its teams these days (10:12). Plus: another segment of Line ’Em Up, where Tjarks analyzes the lineups we are seeing on the floor (33:17).
Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Jonathan Tjarks

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
